alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:37PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST BATON ROUGE, SOUTHEASTERN POINTE COUPEE, NORTH CENTRAL IBERVILLE AND WEST CENTRAL EAST BATON ROUGE PARISHES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 437 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rosedale, or 13 miles west of Port Allen, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Allen, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, and Erwinville. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 137 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
